Definition.WordDefinition: Stevens n 1: United States psychologist and psychophysicist who proposed Stevens' power law to replace Fechner's law (1906-1973) [syn: {Smitty Stevens}, {S. Smith Stevens}, {Stanley Smith Stevens}] 2: United States poet (1879-1955) [syn: {Wallace Stevens}] 3: United States filmmaker (1905-1975) [syn: {George Stevens}]
